main event: A formation of six to eight UFOs was sighted flying at high speed at an altitude of around 30 miles.
interesting points: The UFOs were bluish-white in color and approximately 100 feet in diameter.
The UFOs were initially in a V-shaped formation, and then two more joined, making a total of eight saucers.
The UFOs were observed flying at a speed of around 4,000 miles per hour.
The UFOs were sighted for several seconds by multiple witnesses.
The UFOs disappeared into the horizon after a certain point.
sighted object: a formation of six to eight bluish-white UFOs
